name: Flight Xtreme Car 3d Stunt
description:
Like to go fast and fly through the air with total freedom? The latest in flying car game simulators has arrived and now you can transform your sports car into a futuristic flying car.Watch as the wings transform from the car and turn your into a aircraft; you can see all of this in real time with the amazing transforming animation in this flying car game simulator.Easy to play, take off like a real airplane and fly with ease.If you don't want to fly,no problem! switch back to car mode and land back on the road to enjoy the view from below, drive fast, drift hard and have all the fun of cool sports car.
Turn car to fly and become an excited expert of stunt flyer with the open and coolest car.Are you interested in playing adventures where you can drive? Do you want to experience thrillers again in which you can fly? What if you can get both at the same time into the jet car?Bring wings fly into your amazing stunt plane games which have futuristic theme.Intuitive airplane flight physics is available in the real life modified vehicles for providing flight capability.
The future is now and you can take flight in specially modified sports car, perform amazing stunts.Get in the driver seat of the specially modified sports car, do amazing stunts and drifts like a airplane flight mode and turn your fast sports car into a unique flying car!! In an instance you went from a top car driving expert to a professional airplane pilot
Be a futuristic driver and get skills of both driving a sports car and flying a futuristic flying jet in mid air across the top buildings of town.Physics of sports car and flying jet is applied on the game very intelligently.Ever needed to fly your car like stream flying machine?This is the ideal amusement for you.Drive your futuristic flying car.Flying car is made for every one and it will give the pleasure of adrenaline, best driving car simulator.
Features:
1.Outstanding 3d graphics
2.Real and intuitive car driving and flying controls
3.Test your sports car driving skills
4.Improve Plane Flight Ability
5.Great sound effects
